name: Last Dino Standing
description:
Last Dino Standing is a hand-drawn 2D casual game where your goal is just to stay alive avoiding the crazy elements that fall from the sky. You're the last Tyrannosaurus alive in the dinosaur extinction event. We already know how this story ends, but you need to survive as long as you can.

Main features:

  • Funny visuals.
  • Simple accurate movements.
  • 4 difficulty levels to choose from.
  • Timer system.
  • Map variations.

and more secrets to discover.
